mapper.insert: insert into w_sku (sku_id, sku_spu, sku_title, sku_price, sku_describe, sku_inventory, sku_recommend) values (#{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuSpu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{skuDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuInventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update w_sku set sku_spu = #{skuSpu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sku_title = #{skuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_price = #{skuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sku_describe = #{skuDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_inventory = #{skuInventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sku_recommend = #{skuRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sku_id, sku_spu, sku_title, sku_price, sku_describe, sku_inventory, sku_recommend from w_sku
